content:
Silkworm 
 Clare Verbek, Thembani 
 Dladla and Zanele Buthelezi 
 English 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The worms laid smal egs 
 
 on the leaves. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 We fed them mulbery 
 
 leaves. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 2  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 They grew biger and 
 
 became fater. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 3  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The larvae made silk 
 
 cocons. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Inside the cocons, the 
 
 worms turned into pupae. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 5  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Some people bred 
 
 silkworms for a certain 
 
 purpose. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 In China they kep 
 
 thousands of kinds of 
 
 silkworms. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 7  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 They make silk cloths 
 
 using their cocons. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 8
